references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image synthesis method based on latent diffusion models, which is fundamental to the SyncTweedies framework.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces a deep language understanding model for generating photorealistic images from text descriptions, which is crucial for various downstream tasks that SyncTweedies supports.
This paper introduces the DDIM denoising process, which is a core component of the SyncTweedies method for generating diverse visual content.
This paper proposes a novel method for generating 3D models from text prompts using 2D diffusion models, which is a related work that SyncTweedies extends to various downstream tasks.

references.paper_title: Multidiffusion: Fusing diffusion paths for controlled image generation
references.reason: This paper introduces the Multidiffusion framework, which is a related work that synchronizes multiple diffusion processes, offering insights into the SyncTweedies framework.
